site.title: Nicremo - Portfolio
site.description: Developer and creator of modern web templates focusing on Astro, multilingual support, and performance optimization.

hero.name: Nicremo
hero.pitch: I create modern, multilingual web templates and share them on GitHub to help developers build fast, accessible websites.

values.title: My Approach
values.subtitle: These three values shape my work and help me create compelling web templates.
values.card1Text: Fast loading times and optimal performance are the foundation for great user experiences â€“ every template achieves 90+ Lighthouse scores.
values.card2Text: Multilingual support and WCAG 2.1 AA compliance ensure that everyone can use the templates, regardless of language or abilities.
values.card3Text: Clean code, clear documentation, and easy customization through JSON files make it simple for developers to get started quickly.

skills.title: Skills & Tools
skills.subtitle: With these tools and technologies, I create modern, performant web templates.

frontend.title: Frontend & Frameworks
frontend.description: Modern web development with Astro, React, and static site generation.

design.title: Design & Styling
design.description: Beautiful interfaces with Tailwind CSS, responsive design, and dark mode support.

tools.title: Development Tools
tools.description: Version control, deployment, and optimization for production-ready templates.

projects.pageDescription: A collection of open-source templates and projects shared on GitHub.
projects.heroSubtitle: Explore my collection of web templates and open-source projects.
projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.subtitle: Open-source templates and projects available on GitHub for developers worldwide.

astroPortfolio.shortDescription: Modern, multilingual portfolio template built with Astro and Tailwind CSS featuring dark mode and i18n support.
astroPortfolio.challenge: Creating a performant, multilingual portfolio template that's easy to customize without touching code.
astroPortfolio.approach: Using Astro for optimal performance, JSON-based content management, and comprehensive documentation for easy setup.
astroPortfolio.result: 100/100 Lighthouse score, fully responsive, available in multiple languages, and used by developers worldwide.

coreprotectWebUI.shortDescription: Web interface for CoreProtect Minecraft plugin with real-time player activity tracking and analytics.
coreprotectWebUI.challenge: Visualizing complex Minecraft server data in an intuitive, player-centric dashboard.
coreprotectWebUI.approach: Astro SSR with React components, MySQL integration, and responsive dark-themed UI with real-time updates.
coreprotectWebUI.result: 663,000+ block changes tracked, 4,000+ container transactions, comprehensive player activity monitoring.

templateCollection.shortDescription: Growing collection of Astro templates shared on GitHub focusing on different use cases and industries.
templateCollection.challenge: Providing developers with production-ready templates that are easy to customize and deploy.
templateCollection.approach: Creating modular, well-documented templates with SEO optimization and modern best practices.
templateCollection.result: Multiple templates with growing community adoption and positive feedback from developers.

timeline.title: My Journey
timeline.subtitle: Development experience and important milestones in my career as a template creator.
timeline.item1Description: Creating and maintaining modern web templates on GitHub. Focus: Astro, multilingual support, performance optimization.
timeline.item2Description: Building production-ready websites and applications. Skills: Astro, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, SSR.
timeline.item3Description: Designing and developing reusable templates for portfolios, landing pages, and web applications with comprehensive documentation.

footerCTA.title: Need a Template?
footerCTA.subtitle: Check out my open-source templates on GitHub and start building your next project today.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have questions about my templates or want to collaborate? Feel free to reach out!
